snippet.title: Official Feed Me Oil 2 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Feed Me Oil 2 by Chillingo Ltd

The long awaited Sequel to one of the App Store`s most loved Puzzle Games is here!

Use slick and realistic physics to Guide Gallons of Oil into the gaping Jaws of Feed Me Oil 2's Surreal living Levels.

With new Elements thrown into the Mix, Feed Me Oil 2 offers plenty of Challenge for any Puzzle Fan.

Features:

- 60 Brand New Levels Poured into four fun-filled Chapters.

- Play with the Elements! Unterwater Puzzles introduce new physics to classic Gameplay.

- Jet Streams of Oil around using a Range of new Tools including Winmills and Boomerangs.

- A radical new Visual Style brings Feed me Oil`s quirky Designs to Life like never before.

- Use the fewest Tools popular to earn the highest rating to share with your Friends.

iTunes Store:

TBA

Homepage:

http://holywatergames.com/
